title: GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE
content:
0x4046B66// GetVehicleWheelSize
float GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to obtain data for.Returns: Float representing size of the wheel (usually between 0.5 and 1.5)Returns vehicle's wheels' size (size is the same for all the wheels, cannot get/set specific wheel of vehicle).
Only works on non-default wheels (returns 0 in case of default wheels).
codeBlocks:
local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for GET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_SIZE
GetVehicleWheelSize(vehicle)
